API Reference

ORSG_Questionnaire

Properties

Property Type Description Default
Id int Unique identifier -
Title string Questionnaire title -
Description string Detailed description -
Questions ORSG_QuestionDefault[] Collection of questions []
CreatedDate DateTime Creation timestamp -
ModifiedDate DateTime Last modification -
IsActive bool Active status true

Methods

GetQuestionsBySection

public ORSG_QuestionDefault[] GetQuestionsBySection(string section)

Returns all questions belonging to the specified section.

public ValidationResult ValidateQuestionnaire()

Validates the questionnaire structure and content.

public float CalculateProgress()

Calculates completion progress as a percentage.

ORSG_QuestionDefault

Properties

Property Type Attributes Description
Id int [Key] Primary key
Section string [Required, StringLength(200)] Section name
SectionOrder int - Section display order
SeqNo int - Question sequence number
Group string [StringLength(200)] Group name
GroupOrder int - Group display order
GroupSeqNo int - Group sequence number
Title string [Required, StringLength(200)] Question title
Description string [Required, StringLength(500)] Question description
DefaultTags string [StringLength(200)] Default tags
QuestionDetail ORSG_QuestionDetail [NotMapped, JsonIgnore] Polymorphic question implementation
QuestionDetailJson string - Serialized question detail
QuestionWeight int - Question weight for scoring
AllowOrdering bool [NotMapped, JsonIgnore] Allow custom ordering

Constructor

public ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty()

Initializes with QuestionType.Empty.

Methods

public override ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty DeserializeFromJson(string json)

Deserializes JSON to empty question detail with fallback.

Factory Classes

ORSG_QuestionDetailFactory

CreateDetailFromJson

public static ORSG_QuestionDetail CreateDetailFromJson(string json)

Creates appropriate concrete type based on JSON content.

Parameters:

  • json - JSON string containing question data

Returns: Concrete ORSG_QuestionDetail instance

Throws: Returns ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty on error

GetTypeFromJson

public static QuestionType GetTypeFromJson(string json)

Extracts question type from JSON without full deserialization.

QuestionType

public enum QuestionType
{
    Empty = 0,
    List = 1,
    ToggleOption = 2
}

    Single,
